title: Butterfingers
text: Drop your weapon.

title: Catch your breath
text: You can only take a move next round.

title: Stuck
text: Your weapon is stuck in a nearby surface. DC 15 Str check to free it.

title: Backswing
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

title: Slipped
text: You are knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.

title: This sword is too heavy
text: You are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Awkward attack
text: You take -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.

title: Overextend
text: You provoke an opportunity attack from all adjacent opponents.

title: Pulled muscle
text: You have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on melee attacks, %ABILITY-STR=Strength% checks and are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Fling
text: You drop your weapon and it lands 1d6 × 5 feet away in a random direction.

title: Broken blade
text: Your weapon is destroyed (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Dex saving throw negates%). %OBJECT-DAMAGE=Magic weapons take only 2d6 damage%.

title: Notched
text: Your weapon takes 1d6 %OBJECT-DAMAGE=points of damage%.

title: Parry! Dodge! Spin! Thrust!
text: You are %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1 round.

title: Hand it over
text: Your target gains possession of your weapon (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Dex saving throw negates%).

title: Shield crash
text: Your attack deals %OBJECT-DAMAGE=damage to your shield%.

title: Winded
text: You are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages% (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Str saving throw negates%).

title: Wide open
text: You are %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% for 1 round.

title: Critical mistake
text: The attack hits you and is a critical hit.

title: Strain
text: You take 1d4 points of %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Too much stuff
text: You become %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% in your gear until you spend an action to free yourself.

title: Spinning swing
text: You are %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d4 rounds.

title: I told you it was sharp
text: You are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Pin prick
text: You are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Off balance
text: You have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on all attack rolls for 1 round.

title: Sorry
text: Your attack hits an ally adjacent to you or the target.

title: Bonk
text: You are %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Con saving throw negates%).

title: Catastrophic failure
text: You fall %STATUS-UNCONSCIOUS=unconscious% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Con saving throw negates%).

title: Pointy end goes there
text: You take 1 point of %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Broken haft
text: Your weapon loses reach. You have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on attack rolls with it until repaired (Requires Craft for 20% of the item value).

title: Fog of war
text: You don't threat adjacent enemies for 1d6 rounds.

title: Go for the eyes
text: You are %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round.

title: Punt
text: Your weapon flies 2d6 × 5 feet in a random direction.

title: Bad grip
text: You have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on attacks for the next 3 rounds.

title: Who was that
text: You are %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1d3 rounds.

title: You meant to do that
text: Move 10 feet in a random direction provoking opportunity attacks as normal.

title: Eat dirt
text: You fall %STATUS-PRONE=prone% and are %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Dex saving throw negates%).

title: Second thoughts
text: You are %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d6 rounds.

title: Attack the darkness
text: All your enemies have concealment from you for 1d4 rounds.

title: Wait! What?
text: You are %STATUS-CONFUSED=confused% for 1 round.

title: Wrong end
text: If you're using a slashing weapon, you take 1d6 points of damage and you are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Vibration
text: If you're using a bludgeoning weapon, you have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on attacks and %ABILITY-STR=Str% checks and drop your weapon.

title: No way
text: Your attack hits the target, but deals minimum damage.

title: Funny bone
text: You drop whatever is in your off hand.

title: Bent
text: You have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on all attacks with this weapon until it is repaired (Requires Craft for 20% of the item value).

title: All or nothing
text: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.

title: Surrounded by foes
text: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical hit.

title: On the receiving end
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

title: Bohemian earspoon
text: You are %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed% (DC 15 Medicine Check).

title: Better to give
text: You attack damages you instead. Use your target's Str modifier.

title: Cutter
text: You have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on attacks, %ABILITY-STR=Strength% checks and are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: This is bad
text: You are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%.

title: Armor smash
text: Your attack deals %OBJECT-DAMAGE=damage to your armor%.
